snippet: Adam Tang was convicted in absentia of reckless endangerment after posting on YouTube a video of himself racing around Manhattan in 24 minutes.
abstract: Adam Tang, driver convicted in absentia of reckless endangerment after posting on YouTube a video of himself racing around Manhattan in 24 minutes, says he has fled to Canada and does not intend to return to face sentence of up to a year in jail.
lead_paragraph: Adam Tang was convicted in absentia of reckless endangerment after posting on YouTube a video of himself racing around Manhattan in 24 minutes.

headline.main: Manhattan Speeder Says He Has Fled to Canada
headline.print_headline: Manhattan Speeder Says He Has Fled to Canada
